metadata.name: Fishing for Answers
metadata.description:
A response piece to the question, "What does therapy feel like for you?" 

This piece is a very personal piece from 4th Perspective which delves into dissociation and the way we feel when being probed by a therapist. 

"Fishing for Answers" features (left) the artist Ben and (right) Reginald Treefac√©, a capitalist tree created by Ben to reflect the darkest side of his personality and a vessel for his own fears.
